name: Bully squares
description:
The game is created as Ludum Dare 41 entry, theme - combine 2 incompatible genres

The game is a mix of match-3 and simple strategy game

To earn money combine 3 or more squares of one color in a row or column

If enemy square gets to the bottom you will lose money

Controls

To hire red square press R, for green square press G, for blue - B

Click on a square to select it and then click second time to show the destination for selected square
